source:
%%sql

MERGE INTO crm_sanctioneddb.dim_new_debrief AS target
USING (
    SELECT 
        D.new_debriefid AS Debrief_Id_nk,
        COALESCE(D.new_valueoftheaward_base, 0.0) AS Winning_Value,
        A.name AS Winner_Full_Name,
        D.IsActive,
        hash(D.new_debriefid, COALESCE(D.new_valueoftheaward_base, 0.0), COALESCE(A.name, '~')) AS Audit_Hash_Cd
    FROM crm_query.new_debrief D
    LEFT JOIN crm_query.account A ON A.accountid = D.new_winner AND A.IsActive = 1
    WHERE D.IsActive = 1
) AS source
ON (target.Debrief_Id_nk = source.Debrief_Id_nk AND target.IsActive = 1)
WHEN MATCHED AND target.Audit_Hash_Cd <> source.Audit_Hash_Cd THEN
    UPDATE SET 
        Effective_End_Date = current_date(),
        IsActive = 0,
        Winning_Value = source.Winning_Value,
        Winner_Full_Name = source.Winner_Full_Name,
        Date_Updated_Last = current_date(),
        Updated_By = current_user()
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        Debrief_id_nk,
        Debrief_desc_nk,
        Winning_Value,
        Winner_Full_Name,
        Audit_Hash_Cd,
        IsActive,
        effective_start_date,
        effective_end_date,
        Date_Created,
        Date_Updated_Last,
        Created_By,
        Updated_By
    )
    VALUES (
        source.Debrief_Id_nk,
        '',
        source.Winning_Value,
        source.Winner_Full_Name,
        source.Audit_Hash_Cd,
        1,
        current_date(),
        '9999-12-31',
        current_date(),
        current_date(),
        current_user(),
        current_user()
